`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

A [[medication]] or intervention that reduces [[anxiety]].
Comes from the [[Greek]] *lysis* which means to tear apart. 
^[[[notes_Rebound Anxiety]]]


**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
